data.title: Free Dirt
data.description: Free dirt by appointment. Please call Amy at ***. You must come at appointment time and load by self. If you want dirt delivered might be able to arrange that, but there would be a fee.

data.title: Free Dirt! Weather nice this weekend!
data.description:
Big pile of dirt in my drive way. Free to anyone who can come and grab it! Take as much or as little as you like. 
Only a few warm weekend days left in the year to get your yard stuff done! It'll be gone by Sunday (Oct 22nd) afternoon!

data.title: Free clean top soil /fill dirt

data.title: Free fill dirt
